TopicTitle: Anyone Else Recently Build A Bad@** PC in Reponse to upcoming 1.1?

Articles.Content:
I have

Intel i7 3770k @ 3.4ghz

Gygabite M1 Sniper MB

32Gb RAM

256 GB OCZ SSD

2 TB Seagate HDD

Radeon 7950

This computer I have it for the last 4 years if I remember well. It was with 16GB RAM initially.

Aftee 1.1 release I upgraded to 32GB of RAM and I think I run KSP with almost all the 1.1.2 and 1.1.3 mods that are available and still have about 6 GB of RAM free..
